title: Blazin' In The Sun - What font?
content:
What font is used in this artwork?  
Very nice.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083544/http:/typophile.com/files/font_8.png) | 16.92 KB |
author: AnalogSystm

comments.content: Ye old Caslon Swash. [Cabernet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018083544/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0001003) is a recent interpretation.
